extendedInfo.description: - Automatically change how your phone rings (Silent, Vibrate, Quiet, Medium, Loud, etc) by time of day and day of week.- Set an 'impromptu rule' to silence your ringer for a set amount of time, after which it will automatically return to your default setting.- Set exceptions for select callers.

reviews.comment: v1.0.6: Finally, one that works- consistently & reliably, no matter what. Exception times easy & flawless. Works fine w Sound Manager! Droid X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says and its reliable. It\'d be nice if it had an sort of \"exception time\" to the \'rules\' for work brakes in the set days. Just an idea!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best app ever! Have shared with everyone I like. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Had on my old blackberry and was one of the first things I installed when I got my new phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cannot mute. Customer service does not respond. Clunky interface...waste of money. Installed on Droid Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I used this app on my BB Bold, and loved it. I didn\'t even try any other apps when I got my HTC Sensation, just installed this one because I know it works and is very simple to set up with lots of options. I do think they should add an option for excepting certain email addresses/contacts from rules...would be perfect if they did that, considering some of the limitations of this phone regarding notifications for emails.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I absolutely love this application! Works flawlessly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Finally a great program that surpasses blackberry\'s profiles. Lots of options. Works great. Exception list allow calls through!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs an update that triggers change on calendar events. Blackberry version is much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the most useful app EVER!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The idea is good:
reviews.comment: But after an call, guess what? The phone goes in silent. Not every time, but randomly. That\'s definetively not good! ;)  Nexus One (not rooted).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on HTC EVO. Wish I could let texts as exclusions thru though?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app! Phones get you fired where I work and not cool when it rings at church and never had a ring when it was set to silent. Worth every cent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on hero 2.1!,
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best of all the Android timed profile apps I\'ve tried. Works simply & effectively. Exceptions list is a useful bonus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved this app on my Blackberry - now love it on my Droid! Best auto profiles app! Works flawlessly!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it. Droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. Perfect replacement for what i was using locale for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Loved this app when I had Blackberry. Glad I can still use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best by far
reviews.comment: This is the best app nobody knows about.
reviews.author: mike lober
